original_title: Germany’s Merz facing opposition over Ukraine troop plan – Bild — RT World News
article_summary: Ukrainian Suspect Arrested in Italy over Nord Stream Pipeline Sabotage: A Ukrainian man, identified as Sergey K, has been arrested in Italy on suspicion of involvement in the bombing of the Nord Stream gas pipelines in 2022. German investigators believe he led a unit responsible for the explosions near the island of Bornholm in September 2022. The attacks, which ruptured both Nord Stream 1 and 2 pipelines, were initially blamed on Russian operatives but were later linked to Ukrainian nationals.</s>
